settings.editor: Corfu Resort is a wonderful choice for quiet and relaxing holidays in Corfu island. In a family oriented environment with modern facilities and the alluring sea of the Ionian in just 200m away, we guarantee of a carefree and memorable summer experience.

settings.title: Comfortable rooms offering all modern facilities

settings.editor: This Room’s delicate pink hues, the color of childhood and gentleness, blend with the deeper, more joyful shades of blue, to create a bright and cheerful ambience dominated by the wrought-iron king-size bed, embellished by ringlets and ample wardrobes, this room overlooks the central courtyard.

15% off the total price for all bookings of over one week stay in September and October.

In a family oriented environment with modern facilities and the alluring sea of the Ionian in just 200m away, we guarantee of a carefree and memorable summer experience.

settings.title: All you need for a perfect holiday in Corfu Island

settings.editor:
You can reach Corfu by air through its international airport, "Dionysios Solomos", which is situated in the southern part of the island, in a distance of 5km from Corfu Resort.

You can book your flight tickets through the following links:

• From UK and Italy: easyJet
  • From UK only: Jet2.com
  • From Austria, Germany, Switzerland and many connection flights worldwide: airberlin
  • From Austria and with many connection flight options from Germany and Switzerland: Niki
  • From Brussels: Ryanair

This Room’s delicate pink hues, the color of childhood and gentleness, blend with the deeper, more joyful shades of blue, to create a bright and cheerful ambience dominated by the wrought-iron king-size bed, embellished by ringlets and ample wardrobes, this room overlooks the central courtyard.

• From UK and Italy: easyJet
  • From UK only: Jet2.com
  • From Austria, Germany, Switzerland and many connection flights
